Package grails.plugin.cache.ehcache

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    EhcacheBlockingCache Ehcache-based implementation of BlockingCache.
    EhcacheCacheConfiguration Ehcache-based implementation of CacheConfiguration.
    EhcacheConfigBuilder @author Burt Beckwith
    EhcacheConfigLoader @author Burt Beckwith
    GrailsEhCacheManagerFactoryBean Based on org.springframework.cache.ehcache.EhCacheManagerFactoryBean.
    GrailsEhCacheManagerFactoryBean.ReloadableCacheManager
    GrailsEhCacheManagerFactoryBean.ReloadableCacheManager.ProxyEhcache An Ehcache implementation that always gets the cache, by name, from the CacheManager
    GrailsEhcacheCache Extends the default implementation to return GrailsValueWrapper instances instead of SimpleValueWrapper, to include the Ehcache Element instance.
    GrailsEhcacheCacheManager Based on org.springframework.cache.ehcache.EhCacheCacheManager; reworked to return GrailsEhcacheCache instances.
